title: Learning Design and Item Development Competency Enhancement Based on PISA Mathematical Literacy Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level learners with foundational mathematics education theory and experience in assessment tool development
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers, domain expertise: intermediate, subject/job field: social studies, technology environment: BYOD, assessment method: formative assessment-focused

learning_goals: Learners accurately analyze over 80% of core elements in the PISA mathematical literacy assessment framework.
Learners independently develop at least three mathematical literacy learning designs aligned with PISA assessment guidelines.
Learners generate over 10 items applying PISA-based question design principles (e.g., situational context integration, multi-step reasoning requirements).

resources: LMS platform (video lectures, discussion board, assignment submission system)
PISA Official Assessment Guidelines and Sample Item Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
